pages.text: You may have noticed the world is rather peaceful at night. Until you have ventured into other dimensions, the worst thing that will spawn on the surface are Spiders.

However, venturing into another dimension will cause the common undead and Endermen to rise from the earth, acquiring flint will cause Filch Lizards to appear, creating a furnace will cause Creepers to spawn, and entering the bronze age will wake the Skeleton Warriors.
